entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
